sentence.Network_en: the soporific effect of the sun
sentence.Network_cn: 太阳让人昏昏欲睡的作用

sentence.Network_en: I dozed off during the soporific music.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听到这催人入睡的音乐,便不知不觉打起盹儿来了.

sentence.Network_en: The warmth of the room and the monotony of the speaker's voice grew soporific.
sentence.Network_cn: 房间里的热气和发言人单调的声音让人昏昏欲睡。

英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(131) ... soporiferous 催眠的 soporific 催眠药 soporose 昏睡的.
song 鸟叫声soporific 催眠剂sorbent 吸着剂
GRE词汇精选_百度文库 ... 安眠药，鸦片制剂 somnolent adj． 思睡的，催眠的 soporific adj． 催眠的，n.安眠药 insomnia n．.

list.abs: sophora japonica 槐米soporific perfume 香梦露soporifics 催眠药
organic compound having powerful soporific effect ; overdose can be fatal., 有催眠作用的桔黄色化合物 ; 过量使用有生命危险.
determination of the mixed soporific by infrared subtractive spectroscopy technique ., 红外差谱技术用于混合安眠药的鉴定.
I often have to take soporific before I go to bed., 我常在睡前不得不服安眠药.

entry.def: Something that is soporific makes you feel sleepy.

example.ex: The warmth of the room and the monotony of the speaker's voice grew soporific.
example.tran: 房间里的热气和发言人单调的声音让人昏昏欲睡。

auth_sentence.content: Those who tried to listen found the soporific influence irresistible.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those who tried to listen found the soporific influence irresistible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those who tried to listen found the soporific influence irresistible.

auth_sentence.content: Gentle...motion is normally soothing and soporific.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gentle...motion is normally soothing and soporific.

auth_sentence.content: The lights are low and a soporific electronic soundtrack fills the air.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lights are low and a soporific electronic soundtrack fills the air.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lights are low and a soporific electronic soundtrack fills the air.
